#include<stdio.h>

int two, three, five;

void fact(int n)
{
	int d = 2;

	if (n < 2)
	{
		return;
	}
	else if (n == 2)
	{
		two++;
		return;
	}
	else if (n == 3)
	{
		three++;
		return;
	}
	else if (n == 5)
	{
		five++;
		return;
	}

	while (d < n)
	{
		if (n % d == 0)
		{
			if (d == 2)
				two++;
			else if (d == 3)
				three++;
			else if (d == 5)
				five++;

			n /= d;
		}
		else
		{
			if (d == 2)
			{
				d = 3;
			}
			else
			{
				d += 2;
			}
		}
	}
	if (d == 2)
		two++;
	else if (d == 3)
		three++;
	else if (d == 5)
		five++;
}

int main(void)
{
	int T, N;

	scanf("%d", &T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		two=three=five=0;
		
		while(N>0)
		{
			fact(N);
			N--;
		}
		
		printf("%d\n%d\n%d\n",two, three, five);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
